divs: Sighting DetailsAt 7:50 pm I was packing my car for a trip home this weekend from the side of my Dorm facing Daytona Beach International, at Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University (ERAU). At about 7:51pm I briefly turned around to grab my suitcase and glanced up noticing an extremly large Bommerang shaped aerocraft that appeared to have just entered the atmosphere. It had 5 lights (all of which where a bright grey in color) and appeared to be at least a mile in length when comparing the Cessna's and 737 flying in the area. After I saw it I watched it until it entered cloud cover and from its vector appeared to be heading SW of my position at ERAU.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Daytona Beach
There were no other sightings in Daytona Beach on or around October 10th 2008
Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Flew over Daytona Beach airport as if entering atmosphere, then proceeded into cloud cover.
